If repeat incident, linkage to past incident through Incident ID

label: custom script
name: customscript
value:
<script>

  // function for get form state and restrict fields.
  $(document).ready(function(){
    var formState = $('.form-status').val();
    if(typeof formState === 'undefined' || formState ===''){
     $('.RiskCategory').hide();
     $('.RiskCategory').closest('div.form-group').hide();
     $('.OperationalImpact').hide();
     $('.OperationalImpact').closest('div.form-group').hide();
     $('.FinancialImpact').hide();
     $('.FinancialImpact').closest('div.form-group').hide();
     $('.ReputationImpact').hide();
     $('.ReputationImpact').closest('div.form-group').hide();
     $('.ComplianceImpact').hide();
     $('.ComplianceImpact').closest('div.form-group').hide();
     $('.link-to-workflow').hide();
     $('.link-to-workflow').closest('div.form-group').hide();
     $('#Approvers').hide();
     $('#Approvers').closest('div.form-group').hide();
     $('.RiskComments').hide();
     $('.RiskComments').closest('div.form-group').hide();
      var userInfo = JSON.parse($('.userJsonData').val());
      $('.ManageroftheUser').val(userInfo['userManagerName']);
      $('.FunctionoftheUser').val(userInfo['userDepartment']);
    }
    if(formState === 'draft'){
     $('.RiskCategory').hide();
     $('.RiskCategory').closest('div.form-group').hide();
     $('.OperationalImpact').hide();
     $('.OperationalImpact').closest('div.form-group').hide();
     $('.FinancialImpact').hide();
     $('.FinancialImpact').closest('div.form-group').hide();
     $('.ReputationImpact').hide();
     $('.ReputationImpact').closest('div.form-group').hide();
     $('.ComplianceImpact').hide();
     $('.ComplianceImpact').closest('div.form-group').hide();
     $('.link-to-workflow').hide();
     $('.link-to-workflow').closest('div.form-group').hide();
     $('#Approvers').hide();
     $('#Approvers').closest('div.form-group').hide();
     $('.RiskComments').hide();
     $('.RiskComments').closest('div.form-group').hide();
     var actionRequiredVal = $('.ActionRequired').val();
     if(actionRequiredVal === 'Yes') {
       $('.TypeofAction').show();
       $('.TypeofAction').closest('div.form-group').show();
       $('.ActionTaken').show();
       $('.ActionTaken').closest('div.form-group').show();
       $('.ActionclosuredateTarget').show();
       $('.ActionclosuredateTarget').closest('div.form-group').show();
       $('.Responsibility').show();
       $('.Responsibility').closest('div.form-group').show();
       $('.ActionCompleted').show();
       $('.ActionCompleted').closest('div.form-group').show();
       $('.ActionClosedDate').show();
       $('.ActionClosedDate').closest('div.form-group').show();
     }
    }
    if(formState === 'pending') {
      $('.save-as-draft-form').hide();
      $('.submit-form').show();
      $('.RiskCategory').attr('validation','required');
      $('.OperationalImpact').attr('validation','required');
      $('.FinancialImpact').attr('validation','required');
      $('.ReputationImpact').attr('validation','required');
      $('.ComplianceImpact').attr('validation','required');
      $('#Approvers').attr('validation','required');
      var actionRequiredVal = $('.ActionRequired').val();
      if(actionRequiredVal === 'Yes') {
       $('.TypeofAction').show();
       $('.TypeofAction').closest('div.form-group').show();
       $('.ActionTaken').show();
       $('.ActionTaken').closest('div.form-group').show();
       $('.ActionclosuredateTarget').show();
       $('.ActionclosuredateTarget').closest('div.form-group').show();
       $('.Responsibility').show();
       $('.Responsibility').closest('div.form-group').show();
       $('.ActionCompleted').show();
       $('.ActionCompleted').closest('div.form-group').show();
       $('.ActionClosedDate').show();
       $('.ActionClosedDate').closest('div.form-group').show();
     }
    }
	
	var value = $('input[id=Whenyouwanttofillrestofthedetailsrelatedtoincident]:checked').val();
	if(typeof value === 'undefined'){
		hideForm2();
	}else if(value  === 'Now') {
		showForm2();
	}
	if(value  === 'Later') {
		hideForm2();
	}
  });

$(document).on('change', '.ActionRequired', function() {
	var actionRequiredVar = $('.ActionRequired').val();
	if(actionRequiredVar === 'Yes') {
		$('.TypeofAction').show();
		$('.TypeofAction').closest('div.form-group').show();
		$('.TypeofAction').attr('validation','required');   
		$('.ActionTaken').show();
		$('.ActionTaken').closest('div.form-group').show();
		$('.ActionTaken').attr('validation','required');   
		$('.ActionclosuredateTarget').show();
		$('.ActionclosuredateTarget').closest('div.form-group').show();
		$('.ActionclosuredateTarget').attr('validation','required');
                $('.Responsibility').show();
		$('.Responsibility').closest('div.form-group').show();
		$('.Responsibility').attr('validation','required');
                $('.ActionCompleted').show();
		$('.ActionCompleted').closest('div.form-group').show();
		$('.ActionCompleted').attr('validation','required'); 
                $('.ActionClosedDate').show();
		$('.ActionClosedDate').closest('div.form-group').show();
		$('.ActionClosedDate').attr('validation','required');  

	}else {
		$('.TypeofAction').hide();
		$('.TypeofAction').closest('div.form-group').hide();
		$('.TypeofAction').attr('validation','');   
		$('.ActionTaken').hide();
		$('.ActionTaken').closest('div.form-group').hide();
		$('.ActionTaken').attr('validation','');   
		$('.ActionclosuredateTarget').hide();
		$('.ActionclosuredateTarget').closest('div.form-group').hide();
		$('.ActionclosuredateTarget').attr('validation','');
                $('.Responsibility').hide();
		$('.Responsibility').closest('div.form-group').hide();
		$('.Responsibility').attr('validation','');
                $('.ActionCompleted').hide();
		$('.ActionCompleted').closest('div.form-group').hide();
		$('.ActionCompleted').attr('validation',''); 
                $('.ActionClosedDate').hide();
		$('.ActionClosedDate').closest('div.form-group').hide();
		$('.ActionClosedDate').attr('validation','');
	}
})  
  
function showForm2(){
    $('.ActionRequired').show();
    $('.ActionRequired').closest('div.form-group').show();
    $('.ActionRequired').attr('validation','required');
    $('.HitCategory').show();
    $('.HitCategory').closest('div.form-group').show();
    $('.HitCategory').attr('validation','required');	
    $('.EstimatedLossifapplicable').show();
    $('.EstimatedLossifapplicable').closest('div.form-group').show();
    $('.EstimatedLossifapplicable').attr('validation','required');
    $('.ActualLossifapplicable').show();
    $('.ActualLossifapplicable').closest('div.form-group').show();
    $('.ActualLossifapplicable').attr('validation','required');
    $('.Impactedcountifapplicable').show();
    $('.Impactedcountifapplicable').closest('div.form-group').show();
    $('.Impactedcountifapplicable').attr('validation','required');
	
    $( 'input[id^=ImpactedStakeholders]' ).closest('div.form-group').show();
    $( 'input[id^=ImpactedStakeholders]' ).show();
    $( 'input[id^=ImpactedStakeholders]' ).attr('validation','required');
    $('.RCAavailable').attr('validation','required');
}  

function hideForm2() {
	$('.ActionRequired').hide();
    $('.ActionRequired').closest('div.form-group').hide();  
	$('.ActionRequired').attr('validation','');   
	$('.TypeofAction').hide();
	$('.TypeofAction').closest('div.form-group').hide();
	$('.ActionTaken').hide();
	$('.ActionTaken').closest('div.form-group').hide();
	$('.ActionclosuredateTarget').hide();
	$('.ActionclosuredateTarget').closest('div.form-group').hide();
	$('.Responsibility').hide();
	$('.Responsibility').closest('div.form-group').hide();
	$('.Responsibility').attr('validation','');
	$('.ActionCompleted').hide();
	$('.ActionCompleted').closest('div.form-group').hide();
	$('.ActionClosedDate').hide();
	$('.ActionClosedDate').closest('div.form-group').hide();
	$('.HitCategory').hide();
	$('.HitCategory').closest('div.form-group').hide();
	$('.HitCategory').attr('validation','');
	$('.EstimatedLossifapplicable').hide();
	$('.EstimatedLossifapplicable').closest('div.form-group').hide();
	$('.EstimatedLossifapplicable').attr('validation','');
	$('.ActualLossifapplicable').hide();
	$('.ActualLossifapplicable').closest('div.form-group').hide();
	$('.ActualLossifapplicable').attr('validation','');
	$('.Impactedcountifapplicable').hide();
	$('.Impactedcountifapplicable').closest('div.form-group').hide();
	$('.Impactedcountifapplicable').attr('validation','');
	$( 'input[id^=ImpactedStakeholders]' ).closest('div.form-group').hide();
	$( 'input[id^=ImpactedStakeholders]' ).hide();
	$( 'input[id^=ImpactedStakeholders]' ).attr('validation','');
	$('.RCAavailable').attr('validation','');
	
}
$(document).on('click', '.Whenyouwanttofillrestofthedetailsrelatedtoincident', function() {
  var value = $('input[id=Whenyouwanttofillrestofthedetailsrelatedtoincident]:checked').val();
  if(value  === 'Now') {
    showForm2();
  }
  if(value  === 'Later') {
	hideForm2();
  }
});

//function for e  - + validations and rupay comma on number fields on EstimatedLossifapplicable.
  $(document).on('keypress', '.EstimatedLossifapplicable', function(e){
    if (e.which != 8 && e.which != 44 && e.which != 46 && e.which != 0 && 
    (e.which < 48 || e.which > 57)) {
      e.preventDefault();
    }
  });
$(document).on('keyup', '.EstimatedLossifapplicable', function(e){
    var value = $('.EstimatedLossifapplicable').val();
    value = value.replace(/,/g,'');
    $('.EstimatedLossifapplicable').val(numberWithCommas(value));
});


//function for e  - + validations on number fields on ActualLossifapplicable.
$(document).on('keypress', '.ActualLossifapplicable', function(e){
    if (e.which != 8 && e.which != 44 && e.which != 46 && e.which != 0 && 
    (e.which < 48 || e.which > 57)) {
      e.preventDefault();
    }
  });
$(document).on('keyup', '.ActualLossifapplicable', function(e){
    var value = $('.ActualLossifapplicable').val();
    value = value.replace(/,/g,'');
    $('.ActualLossifapplicable').val(numberWithCommas(value));
});

//function for e  - + validations on number fields on Impactedcountifapplicable.
$(document).on('keypress', '.Impactedcountifapplicable', function(e){
    if (e.which != 8 && e.which != 44 && e.which != 46 && e.which != 0 && 
    (e.which < 48 || e.which > 57)) {
      e.preventDefault();
    }
  });
$(document).on('keyup', '.Impactedcountifapplicable', function(e){
    var value = $('.Impactedcountifapplicable').val();
    value = value.replace(/,/g,'');
    $('.Impactedcountifapplicable').val(numberWithCommas(value));
});

// function for convert rupay with comma.
function numberWithCommas(x) {
    var parts = x.toString().split('.');
    parts[0] = parts[0].replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ',');
    return parts.join('.');
}

//RCA available on
$(document).on('change', '.RCAavailable', function () {
     typeOfRCAavailableHideAndShow();
 });

//function use for show and hide 'RCAavailable' filed.
function typeOfRCAavailableHideAndShow(){
  var rcAavailable= $('.RCAavailable').val();
  if(rcAavailable== 'Yes'){
    $('.RootCauseAnalysis').show();
    $('.RootCauseAnalysis').closest('div.form-group').show();
	$('.RootCauseAnalysis').attr('validation','required');
  }else{
    $('.RootCauseAnalysis').hide();
    $('.RootCauseAnalysis').closest('div.form-group').hide();
	$('.RootCauseAnalysis').attr('validation','');
  }
}
  //script on load     
  $('.FunctionoftheUser').hide();
  $('.FunctionoftheUser').closest('div.form-group').hide();
  $('.ManageroftheUser').hide();
  $('.ManageroftheUser').closest('div.form-group').hide();
  $('#rmspoc-user').hide();
  $('#rmspoc-user').closest('div.form-group').hide();
  $('.RootCauseAnalysis').hide();
  $('.RootCauseAnalysis').closest('div.form-group').hide();
  $('.ActionRequired').hide();
  $('.ActionRequired').closest('div.form-group').hide();   
  $('.TypeofAction').hide();
  $('.TypeofAction').closest('div.form-group').hide();
  $('.ActionTaken').hide();
  $('.ActionTaken').closest('div.form-group').hide();
 $('.ActionclosuredateTarget').hide();
 $('.ActionclosuredateTarget').closest('div.form-group').hide();
$('.Responsibility').hide();
 $('.Responsibility').closest('div.form-group').hide();
$('.ActionCompleted').hide();
 $('.ActionCompleted').closest('div.form-group').hide();
$('.ActionClosedDate').hide();
 $('.ActionClosedDate').closest('div.form-group').hide();
$('.HitCategory').hide();
 $('.HitCategory').closest('div.form-group').hide();
$('.EstimatedLossifapplicable').hide();
 $('.EstimatedLossifapplicable').closest('div.form-group').hide();
$('.ActualLossifapplicable').hide();
 $('.ActualLossifapplicable').closest('div.form-group').hide();
$('.Impactedcountifapplicable').hide();
 $('.Impactedcountifapplicable').closest('div.form-group').hide();
$( 'input[id^=ImpactedStakeholders]' ).closest('div.form-group').hide();
$( 'input[id^=ImpactedStakeholders]' ).hide();

$('input[name*=DateofIncident]').datepicker({
	dateFormat : 'dd/M/yy',
	changeMonth : true,
	changeYear : true,
	maxDate : new Date(),
	gotoCurrent : true
  });

$('input[name*=ActionclosuredateTarget]').datepicker({
	dateFormat : 'dd/M/yy',
	changeMonth : true,
	changeYear : true,
	minDate : new Date(),
	gotoCurrent : true
  });

$('input[name*=ActionClosedDate]').datepicker({
	dateFormat : 'dd/M/yy',
	changeMonth : true,
	changeYear : true,
	minDate : new Date(),
	gotoCurrent : true
  });
</script>
